Tea with Emily Perfume Oil - White Tea, White Musk, Sweet Berries, Soft Ginger, Nutmeg, Yuzu, Smoky Woods- Roll On Perfume

She is that pleasant next door neighbor of yours who offers you a nice hot cup of tea and conversation. This scent carriers top notes of white tea, bergamot, yuzu and ginger; followed by middle notes of earl gray tea, and nutmeg; finished off with bottom notes of musk, woods and berries.

Belle & Blaire perfume oil is concentrated with a base of fractionated coconut oil and 1/4 amount of jojoba oil for nourishment of the skin. The fractionated coconut oil is a very light oil and will not give you that greasy feel that you get with most other oils used for perfumes.

Any scents with notes of musk, honey, or leather are synthetic and are not derived from animal ingredients. 100% Vegan product!

Size: 10ml each Perfume Oil

Ingredients: Fractionated coconut oil, jojoba oil, and fragrance.

name: Belle Victorian Whipped Soap
description:
Belle Victorian Whipped Soap - Musk, Floral, Citrus, Fresh Powder, Woody, Amber- 4oz

I can't quite put my hands on how fresh this fragrance really smells. It reminds me of that expensive top brand perfume scent that you can purchase at Nordstroms, but without the nasty chemicals that come with it. So does it really have top brand ingredients then? You'll have to make that call.

Belle Victorian is timeless, a beautiful, delicate scent inspired by softness, flowers, and sophistication. This blend is a reminder of freshness with top notes of musk, yellow floral and the powdery scent of heaven, followed by middle notes of citrus and bottom notes of woodsy aroma and amber. This scent is far from heady and extremely fresh. I promise you will not be disappointed!

To use: Apply a small portion onto a wet wash cloth, bath pouf, or into hand and treat your skin with rich creamy lather then rinse off.

We proudly list EVERY ingredient because we believe that you have the right to know.

Ingredients: Aqua, glycerin, Sorbitol, sodium cocoyl Isethionate, disodium lauryl sulfosuccinate, Phenoxyethanol, Tetrasodium EDTA, sodium chloride (salt), sweet almond oil, Avocado oil, fragrance and color.

No animal testing

Size: 4oz

name: Wax Tarts (Cotton Candy, Creme Brulee, Satsuma, Strawberry Frost)
description:
(Pic 1) Cotton Candy: The aroma that will remind you of that fun trip to the amusement park. That sweet spun cotton candy that you could not leave without. The scent is exactly like that sweet lovely fragrance. 

(Pic 2)  Creme Brulee: Just think of the creamy succulent scent of cream brulee. What a lovely scent to add to your home. Your guests will appreciate it! 

(Pic 3) Satsuma: A citrusy scent with a wonderful blend of orange, peach, mandarin, lime, mango, orange flowers and jasmine. Very unique and captivating to the senses. If your not a fan of citrusy scents, you will be because this one is a serious winner! I promise you will thank me for introducing it if you haven't already tried this one yet. 

(Pic 4) Strawberry Frost: Smells just like a combination of strawberry, vanilla and lemon mixed together to make an extraordinary scent. Yum!!! 

----------------------------------------

Why wax tarts instead of soy tarts? They hold the fragrance longer and they evaporate instead of having to pour out hot liquid into the trash.

Directions: Pop the tart out of the container and place it in your electric tart or tealight warmer. You will have enough to break a wax tart in half to use twice. Each wax tart will provide approximately 10 -12 hours of delicious fragrance!

This listing is for one wax tart only.

name: Wax Tarts (Coconut Lime Verbena, Fruity Rings, Sweet Cookie Dough)

(Pic 3) Sweet Cookie Dough: Smells just like grandma in the kitchen cooking up your favorite cookies. Very rich and sweet.
